item.title: Ziv Zaifman - A Million Dreams - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
As heard in The Greatest Showman.
Also visit the version by Kris Gilbert: https://youtu.be/0_auBl2YMEQ
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Hugh Jackman - From Now On - Key of A
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
All rights belong to Benj Pasek and Justin Paul.
Chords in this song: A, E, C#m, B
This is the song in it's original key. If you want an easier version to play, go check out this video we made! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wiqK8-BFhkg
Check out our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub
Like our page on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
Strum On!

item.title: Hugh Jackman - From Now On - Key of F
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
To make the chords easier to play, we have transposed the original song one half step higher. We will be uploading a video with the original key and chord charts at a later date.
All rights belong to Benj Pasek, Justin Paul, and the writers of the movie The Greatest Showman.
Chords used: Dm, Bb, C, F
Check out our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/
Like our page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
Strum On!

item.title: Ziv Zaifman - A Million Dreams - Key of C
item.description: The video is for educational purposes only. I do not own the rights. Music by Benj Pasek and Justin Paul
